resources.string: Move $ around to eliminate all debts
This program was done by Biggs. You can find him easily enough by searching.
Inspired by a Numberphile video by Dr. Holley (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=U33dsEcKgeQ). I was surprised no had made a computer version of that game, soâ€¦here it is!
There\'s way more than you ever wanted to know about his game here: https://mattbaker.blog/2013/10/18/riemann-roch-for-graphs-and-applications/
